title: Systems Programming
description: C programming language from a system programming perspective. Standard C language including operators, I/O functions, and data types in the context of system functions. Unix commands, shell scripting, file system, editors. 3 lectures, 1 laboratory. Crosslisted as CPE/CSCÂ 357.
prerequisites: CSC/CPE 103 with a grade of C- or better, or consent of instructor, and CSC 225 or CPE/EE 229 or CPE/EE 233
